headline: Senate Candidate JD Vance: I’m Not Another ‘Fake’ Politician
author: NationalWatch
sentences: One example was a tweet in which he yearned for comments from former President Donald Trump — who had been banned permanently by the social media platform — soon after actor Alec Baldwin fatally shot a cinematographer and wounded a director after discharging a prop gun on a movie set in New Mexico.
The former venture capitalist and author of "Hillbilly Elegy" was asked about comments made on social media that could be considered ill-advised rhetoric by some people.
"So, I think the idea that we can't have somewhat offensive humor sometimes from our politicians is basically just asking us to have fake politicians all the time.
